Posted By: Doug Moore
  

I have the following for sale, better higher resolution scans available, both front and back.

Ganley PSA 2 SC 150 No creases, glue res, no paper loss , tough card great color! 33.00

Davidson PSA 2 Nice color, sc 350 slight paper loss on back, no creases, 25.00

Jackson SGC 30, SC 350, Georgeous color, slight paper loss and glue stain,tiny wrinkle, nice card for a 30. 25.00

Geyer P 350-460 SGC 40 a stunning card, just the slighest pin speck of paper loss keeps this from being a psa 5 I think. 35.00

First to commit gets the cards, they are all very nice for the grade given.
All prices include shipping.

please e-mail me at ddm4236@comcast.net for any questions/interest.
